wikipedia_page.main: Alan Petherbridge  (10 September 1927 – 30 July 2020) was a British Olympic athlete. He competed in the 1964 Olympic Games in Tokyo. In September 2010 Petherbridge was inducted to the Welsh Sports Hall of Fame.

response: *David Alan Petherbridge. For services to Judo.
*Alan Petherbridge, 92, British Olympic judoka (1964).Alan Mbe Petherbridge
